name: pubsub-emulator
description: Google GCP Pub/Sub Emulator for local development and testing.

scripts.postversion: TAG=$(echo $(git describe --tags $(git rev-list --tags --max-count=1))) && git tag -a $TAG $TAG -f -m "$(git log `git describe --tags --abbrev=0 HEAD^`..HEAD --oneline)" && git push && git push --tags

author: Robert Jefe Lindstaedt <robert.lindstaedt@tillhub.de>
